Text.Page:
Another memo from Dakuryon's research:

"Lab Report ADE-1231

I have acquired some of Banyakas's seeds. The seeds were provided by some captives, who claimed that they found it in some kind of a temple. Unfortunately, they did not choose to divulge this information until they were nearly dead, so I was unable to ask them more specific questions.

"Fortunately, the experiment with the seeds was successful. Once subjected to my process, the seeds took root and grew quickly into a mighty tree. I of course upgraded its rudimentary nervous system to include a brain.

"Interestingly, the tree has learned to use its sap as a weapon, and can create slaves, both to serve it...and feed it.

If I can replicate this process, I would become godlike!"
